name: Motor Trial Challenge
description:
Navigate your way across ten difficult levels and pull jumps and back flips and you pass objects in your path. Make sure you don't hit your head or fall off your motocross bike or the game will end and you will fail! The best motocross stunt simulator available on-line!

Features:
Your very own unique Motocross Bike.
Beautiful yet difficult levels.
Great graphics.
Movable objects to make levels more challenging.
